channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Shadow Manipulator
channel.description: # Shadow Manipulator **Neutral Killer** **Passive: I'm The Shadow** - Immune to death at night, poison and bleeding. **Passive: Can't Touch This** - Immune to occupation, target changing and death at night. Players who attempt to occupy you or change your target will believe it succeeded. Additionally, you will know who you would've been redirected to if a player attempts to change your target. **Day Ability (Shadow Cleansing)** - Kill a target player. Clear their class and logs. (2 uses) **Day Ability (Shadow Cloaking)** - Change the class your body will appear to all Investigative abilities for one night. (3 uses) **Night Ability (Shadow Arts)** - Choose from a variety of arts to use tonight. (3 uses) **Night Ability (Shadow Steal)** - Kill a target player, replace your shadow arts variety with their night abilites. (∞ uses) Example, you use shadow steal on noble and successfully kill. In the shadow arts , you have noble’s night abilities , gossip and maid spy.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Shadow Manipulator

item.description:
[quote=“Planterror, post:3, topic:73509”]
During the day? dead giveaway.

Yes during day but at night it happens. As such using shadow cleansing and shadow arts successfully kills two players at night.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Shadow Manipulator
item.dc:creator: Justforfun
item.description:
Shadow Manipulator

Neutral Killer

Passive: I’m The Shadow - Immune to death at night, poison and bleeding.

Passive: Can’t Touch This - Immune to occupation, target changing and death at night. Players who attempt to occupy you or change your target will believe it succeeded. Additionally, you will know who you would’ve been redirected to if a player attempts to change your target.

Day Ability (Shadow Cleansing) - Kill a target player. Clear their class and logs. (2 uses)

Day Ability (Shadow Cloaking) - Change the class your body will appear to all Investigative abilities for one night. (3 uses)

Night Ability (Shadow Arts) - Choose from a variety of arts to use tonight. (3 uses)

Night Ability (Shadow Steal) - Kill a target player, replace your shadow arts variety with their night abilites. (∞ uses)

Example, you use shadow steal on noble and successfully kill. In the shadow arts , you have noble’s night abilities , gossip and maid spy.

Read full topic
